query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [CompanyName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [NameWithJobTitle] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [DeliveryMethod] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ContactsInformation] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, CompanyName citext NOT NULL, NameWithJobTitle citext NOT NULL, DeliveryMethod citext NOT NULL, ContactsInformation citext NOT NULL)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_DistribSheet temp where temp.ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
